attributes.action: makei it easier for British people to be able to live and work in America.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like the prime minister to arrange with our american friends to allow british people an easier route to live and work in the USA. We are excluded from the green card lottery and it seems the only legal way is to marry an amrican. Lets change this, most other country's people can enter far easier than this.
